intro_cc: This is a personal art portfolio site. B
intro_udemy_clone: A clone project which helped me learn ReactJs and NextJs. Built with Typescript, Sass on NextJs. Used GraphQL to fetch and post requests and vercel for distribution and CI/CD.
intro_art_uploader: Admin tool for uploading artwork for art portfolio site. Build using NestJs for the back-end and ReactJs on the front. The objects would save in an S3 bucket while saving the object url on a database.
intro_article: Simple how to article for AWS cloudfront invalidations.
